sorcer.core.provider.proxy

Interface Partnership

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseProvider, ExertMonitor, RemoteLoggerManager, ServiceCataloger, ServiceJobber, ServiceProvider, ServiceSpacer, ServiceTasker

    public interface Partnership
    Smart proxies and other proxies containing inner proxies (partners) can extend their functionalty via calls on partners. This interface complements Outer interface for setting inner and admin proxies, while Outer defines partnership accessors.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setAdmin(Object admin)
      Returns the inner proxy of this provider.
      void setInner(Object inner)
      Sets an inner Remote proxy for this proxy.

    • Method Detail

      • setInner

        void setInner(Object inner)
              throws ProviderException
        Sets an inner Remote proxy for this proxy. The inner proxy usually is exported by the service provider setting the inner proxy. The outer proxy can invoke methods on its inner proxy to extend its functionality accordingly.

        This function may be called multiple times for each inner proxy. In this case, the implementor should check the instance type of inner.

        Parameters:
        inner - an inner proxy object
        Throws:
        ProviderException

      • setAdmin

        void setAdmin(Object admin)
              throws ProviderException
        Returns the inner proxy of this provider. Inner proxies can be provided by the registering provider of this proxy or by third party providers. This proxy extends its local functionality by invoking remote methods on its inner proxy.
        Throws:
        ProviderException
